title: Polluwatch
description: This is a web based Air Quality Monitoring System leveraging the Openweather API. It is a project that I, alongside other 6 team members, worked on during my internship at Jhub Africa, based in JKUAT. Utilizing Data analytics, machine learning models and AI, Polluwatch provides real-time air quality data and forecasts for various locations and actionable insights for concerned stakeholders.

title: Meladen Properties Admin dashboard
description: This is a web based Admin dashboard for Meladen Properties, a mock real estate company. The dashboard is designed to help the company manage their properties, clients and employees. It implements client notifications services and insightful statistics to help the company make data driven decisions.
